<Text: Cinema of Colombia:  Colombian cinema began in 1897 and has included silent films, animated films and internationally acclaimed movies.>

Text: Cinema of Colombia:  Government support included an effort in the 1970s to develop the state-owned Cinematographic Development Company ("Compañía de Fomento Cinematográfico" FOCINE) which helped produce some films yet struggled to maintain itself financially viable.

Text: Cinema of Colombia:  FOCINE became defunct in 1993.
